2012) | leader_title1 = | leader_name1 = | total_type = | unit_pref = | area_magnitude = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 389 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 870 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 42,260 | population_as_of = 2009 | population_density_km2 = 109.9 | population_est = | pop_est_as_of = | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = [[UTC-3]] | utc_offset1 = -3 | timezone1_DST = [[UTC-2]] | utc_offset1_DST = -2 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = 13990-000 | area_code_type = | area_code = | website = http://www.pinhal.sp.gov.br | footnotes = }} {{Refimprove|date=December 2009}} '''Espírito Santo do Pinhal''' is a municipality in the state of [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo]] in [[Brazil]]. The population in 2010 is 41,907 (IBGE 2011<ref>{{cite web|title=IBGE - @Cidades|url=http://www.ibge.gov.br/cidadesat/painel/painel.php?codmun=351518}}</ref>) and the area is 389 km². The elevation is 870 m. {{São Paulo state|Campinas}} ==References== {{reflist|close=1}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Espirito Santo Do Pinhal}} [[Category:Populated places in São Paulo (state)]] {{SaoPauloState-geo-stub}}
